meanings.definition: A device used to measure lung capacity.
meanings.sent1: The doctor used spirometers to check how well my lungs were working.
meanings.sent2: The hospital had many spirometers to help diagnose breathing problems.
meanings.sent3: The spirometers at the clinic beeped happily when I blew into them.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like the readings on a spirometer.
meanings.sent5: The spirometers hummed softly, revealing the secrets of my breathing.

meanings.sent1: We need to order more spirometers for the respiratory lab.
meanings.sent2: The researchers compared the results from different spirometers.
meanings.sent3: The spirometers on the shelf looked like a colorful row of toys.
meanings.sent4: His words flowed out in a steady rhythm, like a set of spirometers in sync.
meanings.sent5: The classroom was filled with the sound of students using spirometers for their project.
